Sidebar

Secondary navigation lists can be displayed using a sidebar. The sidebar component is fixed to the left side of the page and will automatically scroll if its contents go beyond the viewport height.

Sidebar menu
Essentials Rating Identity Location Details Activity History Survey

Small sidebar

Add the class .sidebar-sm to a sidebar to make it more narrow, with larger links.

With icons
Essentials Rating Identity Location Details Activity History Survey
Text only
Essentials Rating Identity Location Details Activity History Survey

Other content

A sidebar can be used for more than just a navigation menu. This example shows how to create a filter panel using several different components together.
